title: Semantic cache
description: Embedding-based response cache. SHA-256 fast path for exact match, cosine similarity for semantic match. Uses OpenAI text-embedding-3-small. New SQLite table cache_entries with BLOB embeddings. Returns X-Cache: HIT/MISS header. Non-streaming only.
acceptance_criteria: New internal/cache package with exact and semantic matching
SHA-256 fast path for exact content match
Cosine similarity for semantic match using embeddings
Uses OpenAI text-embedding-3-small for embedding generation
New cache_entries table in SQLite with BLOB embeddings
Returns X-Cache: HIT or X-Cache: MISS header
All tests pass, go vet clean
